name: Luma
appearance: Broad-shouldered pilotess in oilskins trimmed with reflective thread; a chain of lens-charms glitters at her throat.
character: Warm to crews and cold to debtors; a captain’s poise that never wavers in fog.
talents: hearing false bells in a gale
weather nose that smells pressure drops
dreams: monopolize passage through the Salt Spires
establish a hereditary line of master pilots
replace bell-buoys with Cartel-owned light crystals
secrets: green-lit a scheme to echo false bells at the Spires to punish a defaulting convoy
keeps a hidden ledger of side-payments to Saltwarden patrols
once redirected a noble yacht into a ‘safe’ delay channel to force a negotiation
